item.description: Trivia takes place at Chuck's Steak House in Auburn, located at the intersection of Route 20 and Prospect St, between 7 and 9 p.m. Teams are comprised of roughly 6 people each. An emcee reads the questions, and the team bids a certain number of points per answer, depending on confidence level. The team with the most points wins a prize (usually a gift certificate).
item.how_to_find_us: I will give out cell number closer to event. Plus a have a small 5x7 meetup sign.
item.name: Trivia at chucks's steakhouse
